Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near California due to a door problem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near California due to a door problem. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Marine Dr.
ShortDescription: Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, 78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach, #78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

 

Please allow extra travel time
